summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6126 for the improvement of Empire Way from Eddy Street to approximately 275 feet north of Myrtle Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85076, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
